full_summary:
# EF937-240278: Purchase of Furniture for Categories 1 and 6

## Tender Details

- **Tender Reference**: WS4073847867-Doc4073884328
- **Solicitation Number**: WS4073847867
- **Publication Date**: July 5, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date**: August 2, 2023, at 14:00:00

## Tender Description

The Department of Employment and Social Development (ESDC) is seeking proposals for the acquisition of furniture for categories 1 and 6. The scope of the tender includes:

* Acquisition, delivery, and installation of various interconnecting panels and lounge screens

## Tender Availability

The tender opportunity is available on Ariba's discovery platform at the following URL: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16782992](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16782992)

## Trade Agreements

This tender is made available under the following trade agreements:

* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)

## Regions of Opportunity

This tender is targeted to provide opportunities in the following region:

* Thetford Mines

## Regions of Delivery

The delivery of goods will be made to the following region:

* Thetford Mines

## Contracting Entity

The contracting entity for this tender is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC). Please note that the end-user entity for this tender is the Department of Employment and Social Development (ESDC).

## Contact Information

For more information, please contact:

* Julie Carbonneau, Service Desk (elle-la / she-her)
* julie.carbonneau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
